entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement support for private NuGet feeds in package tab-completion #42776
  • System.IO.SerialPort DataReceived drops bytes, not reliable. For serious RS232 use this library has been unusable. #42774
  • [iOS] Net 9 Preview 7, iOS app in Release will crash when UseInterpreter is set to true #42752
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24413.1] Failed to execute command "dotnet watch run" with error "Hot Reload based watching is only supported in .NET 6.0 or newer apps" #42748

Closed

  • EnableUnsafeBinaryFormatterSerialization should be off by default for all projects for .NET 9+ #42311
    9.0.1xx
  • Dotnet publish container regression in 8.0.400 #42719
  • [8.0.400] MSBuild Crash when publishing containers #42731
  • after updating to sdk 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 build fails with "MSB3030: Could not copy the file...apphost.exe" #42722

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled codeflow through 9.0.1xx #42766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable CI builds for the public RC2 branch #42747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • RC2 Branding #42744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove internet sources from auditSources section #42740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Find all workloads! Even if they're in another feature band Fixes #42502 #42513
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
